text: Joseph Leonard may refer to: *Joseph Leonard (soldier) (1876–1946), U.S. Marine and recipient of the Congressional Medal of Honor *Joseph Leonard (priest) (1877–1964), Irish Vincentian priest *Joseph J. Leonard (1876–1962), commissioner of the Boston Police Department *Joe Leonard (baseball) (1894–1920), American baseball player *Joe Leonard (1932–2017), American motorcycle and racecar driver ==See also== *
title: Joseph Leonard
